thread.title: Kevin McCarthy's decision to drop out of House Speaker race stuns O.C. politicians
thread.title_full: Kevin McCarthy's decision to drop out of House Speaker race stuns O.C. politicians

author: JODIE TILLMAN
title: Kevin McCarthy's decision to drop out of House Speaker race stuns O.C. politicians
text: Kevin McCarthy's decision to drop out of House Speaker race stuns O.C. politicians Oct. 8, 2015 Updated 10:28 p.m. 1 of 1 House Majority Leader Kevin McCarthy of California speaks to the media about his decision not to run for nomination for House Speaker replacing John Boehner, Thursday, on Capitol Hill in Washington. In a stunning move, McCarthy withdrew his candidacy for House speaker Thursday, throwing Congress' Republican leadership into chaos. , JACQUELYN MARTIN, THE ASSOCIATED PRESS House Majority Leader Kevin McCarthy of California speaks to the media about his decision not to run for nomination for House Speaker replacing John Boehner, Thursday, on Capitol Hill in Washington. In a stunning move, McCarthy withdrew his candidacy for House speaker Thursday, throwing Congress' Republican leadership into chaos. , JACQUELYN MARTIN, THE ASSOCIATED PRESS
